1.0.name: wordpress/adobe-xmp-for-wp
1.0.description:
Retrieve the following Adobe XMP / IPTC information from images in the WordPress Media Library and NextGEN Galleries:

  • Creator Email
  • Owner Name
  • Creation Date
  • Modification Date
  • Label
  • Credit
  • Source
  • Headline
  • City
  • State
  • Country
  • Country Code
  • Location
  • Title
  • Description
  • Creator
  • Keywords
  • Hierarchical Keywords

The Adobe XMP for WP plugin reads image files progressively (small chunks at a time) to extract the embeded XMP meta data, instead of reading the whole file into memory as other image management plugins do. The extracted XMP data is also cached on disk to improve performance and is refreshed only if/when the original image is modified. You can use the plugin in one of two ways; calling a method from the $adobeXMP global class object in your template(s)
